body:
- libglvnd support was added in #14572.
 - It looks like something went wrong with the rebase (identified in #17512).
 - I started working on fixing the missing code (#17663).
 - After taking another look, @chuckatkins and I decided to just revert, instead (#17682).
 - This PR aims to reintroduce libglvnd support, started in #14572 with the fixes from #17663 and other fixes.
title: (re)introduce libglvnd support
